snippet.title: YAGA'S HUNT Teaser Trailer (Student Game Jam)
snippet.description:
A game by newcomer Year 1 students made for a 1 week game jam.
There are tales of a dreary forest, where Baba Yaga, a child-hunting witch roams! Some kids don't believe the rumors, and decide to camp out one night as a display of their bravery. Be  the one to show them how true those stories really were. 

Avoid the children's flashlights as you creep around their camps. Hide in plain sight with your "house" mode! Don't get caught, or you may find yourself dealing with a more dangerous adversary...

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
Play Yaga's Hunt!
https://bit.ly/YagaItch

Watch a full playthrough here: 
https://youtu.be/CyRmw2cFBc0
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

Main Credits:
-----------------------
Gennady Khudilaynen 
(Lead Designer, Camp Design, Cutscenes, Trailer)

Vittorio Bellinello
(Yaga modelling & Animation, Music)

Erick Divin
(AI)

Rens Linnemans
(AI, Camp & Game Completion Logic)

Edden Lav
(Yaga Movement & Attacking) 

Bauke Van Leeuwen
(Forest Design)
